DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient or the patient's legally acceptable representative provided a signed and dated written informed consent prior to registration and any study-related procedures being performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to prior informed consent by a patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:voluntary authorization, by a patient or research subject, with full comprehension of the risks involved, for diagnostic or investigative procedures, and for medical and surgical treatment.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient, or the patient's leg
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient, or the patient's legally acceptable representative, must provide a signed and dated written informed consent PRIOR to registration and any study-related procedures being performed

ReferenceDocuments.name: 9177 alternate text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has a signed informed consent/assent/durable power of attorney (DPA) been obtained by the patient or parent or parent/legal guardian

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG _CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative signed a study specific informed consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative provided study-specific informed consent and authorization permitting release of personal health information prior to study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative provided study-specific informed consent prior to study entry?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-2 2018320v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
